summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 30 PCS Blue Hair Care Rollers Hair Curlers Silicone No Clip Hair Style Rollers Soft Magic DIY Curling Hairstyle Tools Hair Accessories Review Date: 2018/01/08 Store: ONEONEY Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Clip', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Brand': 'ONEONEY', 'Unit Count': '30.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 5.31 x 2.68 inches; 8.57 Ounces'} Review Text: These are an inexpensive and fairly comfortable way to roll my hair at night. It makes getting up and being ready to go in the morning much faster, since all I have to do is unroll, give a spray and shake - and bam waves for days.
However, the quality is decent but not great, one of the rollers looked like it was left out side and got chewed on. But, 1 out of 30 (I counted them) is still good odds for the price.
They came in the matching clear blue zipper bag, and are easy to store. I'd happily purchase another set. Review Title: Comfy curls Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: AG Care Natural Remedy Apple Cider Vinegar Leave On Mist Review Date: 2019/01/06 Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AG Care', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based, Vegan', 'Hair Type': 'All, Color Treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Gently cleanses and seals cuticle to enhance shine. Superfoods and apple cider vinegar support soft, healthy hair.Gently cleanses and seals cuticle to enhance shine. Superfoods and apple cider vinegar support soft, healthy hair. See more', 'Product Dimensions': '1.75 x 1.75 x 6 inches; 6.14 Ounces', 'Item model number': '100150', 'UPC': '625336002391', 'Manufacturer': 'AG Hair', 'Country of Origin': 'Canada'} Review Text: This leave in hair remedy from AG smells wonderful, like a sweet and spicy scent. While it applies strong, it dissipated and left behind a soft clean spicy smell.
It worked really well, and was best when I used it after a work out on damp hair vs dry or showered.
It’s a nice product in my easy care hair Arsenal, I will be picking it up again for my gym bag for sure! Review Title: Soft hair, smells great! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Sunset Dusk Palette | 15 Color Eye Shadow of BEAUTY GLAZED Eyeshadow Palette | QyeeCosmetics. - Amazon Vine Review Date: 2019/01/06 Store: Qyee Cosmetics Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 4.1 x 0.6 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '725714076539'} Review Text: This is actually a decent palette of eyeshadows. They are not super pigmented, but very easy to work with. This is a very nice beginner palette, especially for the under 10 price.
That said, these need a primer. They last an okay amount of time, but will fade quickly if you don’t use a primer.
Simple cardboard container, very similar to colourpop and bh, but doesn’t have a mirror. Still it’s sturdy and all the pans arrived unbroken!
The shades are arranged nicely, it really has a visual appeal, and makes choosing an eye look easier.
It’s realky not bad, and while my tastes typically run towards the more luxury and pigmented, this is a good entry for a beginner or lighter makeup user.
I will be looking into other palettes by this brand. Review Title: High 3 stars Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: TOUCH IN SOL Flawless Skin Top Coat 1.18 fl.oz. (35ml) - One Step Makeup (Nourishing Ampoule + High Adhesive Makeup Base + Fresh Silky Powder), Moisturizing High Coverage Foundation (#1 Light) Review Date: 2019/04/08 Store: Touch in Sol Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Touch in Sol', 'Coverage': 'Light', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing,Flawless Skin', 'Package Dimensions': '4 x 2.3 x 2.3 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} Review Text: My friend recommended this Touch in Sol Flawless skin top coat, and I am so glad she did.
It is really more of a foundation, it has perfect medium coverage. It feels amazing on my skin, light and silky smooth. It leaves me looking matte, but not dry. It's surprisingly radiant.
I use it over the Touch in Sol primer, without setting powder, and it easily lasts the whole day.
So, here I am recommending it to you! Try it! It's amazing! Review Title: Flawless Foundation Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 100 pcs Compressed Facial Mask Women DIY Beauty Facial Cotton Paper Compress Masque Disposable Dry Sheet Mask for Skin Face Care Review Date: 2019/04/22 Store: Evoio Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Evoio', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Cotton Paper', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Unit Count': '100.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.29 x 4.41 x 2.87 inches; 5.96 Ounces'} Review Text: I wasn't sure what to expect from these compressed facial masks in terms of quality, as reviews were across the board. But, they far exceeded my needs and expectations!
They are about the size of three dimes stacked, and are embossed with little flowers on top, which is really just a pretty presentation.
They expand easily with moisture, I mixed up my own serum solution with essential oil, and it was easy to soak and unfold. I worried I would have to be super delicate so as not to tear the paper, but these are more of a fabric than tissue.
In fact, I opened one up to test it's durability. I used some warm water, added some dish soap and went to town scrubbing my basin. No tears, no ripping, no holes. (In fact it cleaned up really well). I used some extra pulling pressure on the cut parts, mouth, eyes chin, and as expected had tears and stretching happen, but that was with abnormal applied pressure.
They didn't smell, they didn't feel weird, and they fit great. For the relaxing usage of a home facial these little compact masks are perfect. I know exactly what I'm putting on my face. Review Title: Super little facial masks! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Women Facial Razor for Hair Removal - Dermaplaning Tool Peach Fuzz Trimmer Womens Fine Hair Remover Eyebrow Razors and Dermaplane Face Shavers Women's Exfoliating for Sensitive Skin Essential Travel Review Date: 2019/06/19 Store: MODEMODE Product Description: ["MODEMODE Women's Facial Razor Home Dermaplaning - Eyebrow Razor For Women Face Peach Fuzz Hair Removal Womens Face Exfoliating At Daily Eyebrow Shaping Tool"] Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MODEMODE', 'Number of Blades': '1', 'Unit Count': '5.0 Count', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 1.2 x 0.5 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MODEMODE'} Review Text: These are some pretty fantastic razors. They are straight edged, but the provided safety edging prevents me from nicking myself while keeping the blade close to my skin.
It removes peach fuzz quickly, efficiently. My skin is super smooth for about a week after use. My makeup goes on like butter, and I am convinced my moisturizers and serums also work better on my dermaplaned skin.
They are small and precision enough that I can use them around my eyebrows, though I go slow and don't usually use them for that.
But for my upper lip, chin, cheeks and forehead I don't know how I got by before these. While my easy to use electric is nice, these are so much closer. Will be a faithful weekly user! Review Title: Dermaplaning-tastic Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mountain Falls Advanced Formula Nail Polish Remover Pads with 96% Acetone, for Natural Nails, 10 Count Review Date: 2019/09/06 Store: Mountain Falls Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Pad', 'Item Weight': '0.01 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '10 Count'} Review Text: I wasn't expecting to love these nearly as much as I do. Thick, large and easily removes all ten nails worth of polish without making my fingers feel overly dried out like using my regular polish remover.
Because they are all individually sealed I can keep one in my bag for any polish removing emergencies, which trust me... they happen.
These work fast, I don't know what makes the formula 'advanced' but the process is quick and clean.
The smell isn't overwhelming, just the basic remover smell. Works great, travels even better. I'll be keeping these on hand! Review Title: Super Convienent! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Natwag Makeup Remover Pads,18 Pack 3.74 Inch Reusable Microfiber Cleansing Pad with Laundry Bag Suitable for All Skin Types,3 Color Facial Cleansing Pad Set. Review Date: 2020/07/20 Store: Natwag Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Natwag', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '18.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '18', 'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 4.37 x 2.59 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '745103569701'} Review Text: I adore these makeup remover rounds. They are the perfect size for a clean face, or even just to remove my eye makeup. No getting water everywhere, no harsh chemicals or cleansers, and there is plenty in this set so that I can just use and wash a new one each time.
They are very soft, but don't let that mislead you. Add some water, and wipe away the day. Flip it to the longer side and buff and exfoliate. Super soft, super clean skin - zero irritations.
Highly recommend and will never be using disposable face wipes again! Review Title: Cleansing Pads Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: QTMY Crystal Gemstone Headbands Baroque Hair Accessories Head Band Fashion Headwear Hairbands for Women,Pink Review Date: 2021/01/29 Store: QTMY Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 5.63 x 1.02 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ZJ', 'Department': 'womens', 'Manufacturer': 'QTMY'} Review Text: This is a very comfortable headband, it does not have any under grip however and does slip a little. But, it's worth the minor adjustments when wearing.
Very sparkly, this gives off everyday princess vibes. Plenty of color to match just about anything, and arrived without any missing crystals or pokey spots,
Well made and pretty!! Review Title: Fancy Flair Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Sesame Street, Bubble Bath, Extra Sensitive, 16 Oz, Pack of 6 Review Date: 2021/01/29 Store: Sesame Street Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Sesame Street', 'Scent': 'sesame', 'Product Benefits': 'Nourished,Moisturizing', 'Unit Count': '96 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.84 x 7.68 x 5.28 inches; 1 Pounds', 'Item model number': '28051', 'UPC': '735303280513', 'Manufacturer': 'The Village Company'} Review Text: This is a great bubble bath, soft silky bubbles, long lasting and the scent is really pretty. Not overly strong, and super gentle on my toddlers skin.
Happy bath times = happy me! Review Title: Sesame Street Bubble Bath Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Aldqtz 3PCS Large Star Matte Hair Claw Clips ,Big Nonslip Cute Strong Hold Jaw Clip for Thin Hair Long Hair Thick Hair ,Perfect Star Hair Claw Clips for Women Girls Review Date: 2021/07/15 Store: Aldqtz Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Aldqtz', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Straight', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Claw', 'Embellishment': 'Resin', 'Package Dimensions': '9.57 x 4.37 x 1.85 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '725683934441'} Review Text: This adorable star clip set my hair game bar so high that after wearing it I have no where to go but down.
It held my hair up comfortably all day, and I have a thick amount of hair. It also held up my daughters without any issue.
It's distinctive shape is so much cuter than the typical claw clip.
Highly recommend!!! Review Title: Stars Aligned Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Fiber Lash Mascara 2pcs Waterproof Dense Extra High Lash Blast Voluminous Lengthening Mascara Black, 0.54 Fl Oz Review Date: 2021/07/21 Store: Marine Forest Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Lengthening', 'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Item Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 1.77 x 0.91 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'E3050-2', 'UPC': '762403106955'} Review Text: This mascaras is worth the price, a set of two for under 10? Go for it. It's not overly sticky, though the consistency is weird and rubbery coming out of the tube.
It goes on dark, dries quickly and doesn't smudge. Does it really lengthen? Eh. Not really for me. But, it's not messy or flaky.
I don't know if I will repurchase, but the price point is good. Review Title: Cheap and dark Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Ethique Quench Lightweight Solid Face Moisturizer Tube for Oily to Balanced Skin - Plastic-Free, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Eco-Friendly, 2.29 oz (Pack of 1) Review Date: 2022/02/17 Store: Ethique Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ethique', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Unit Count': '2.29 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '3.54 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches; 2.47 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Quench Bar Solid Face Moisturiser', 'UPC': '810003557681'} Review Text: First, the solid cream is solid. At first application I tried just putting it on my face directly from the tube and stopped almost immediately because I did not want to tug at my skin. Instead, I did the bar method of application by using my fingers on the top to warm it and then tapped it onto my skin. The next morning I let it sit on my cheek an extra moment and was apply to seamlessly apply with little to no tugging.
It's a a balm texture from the tube, but then melts into an almost oil/cream. While I find it takes a little for the oils to fully settle onto the skin once they do, I don't find it to be greasy or heavy.
I put this under my SPF in the morning like a serum, and it doesn't pill or bunch up or affect my sunscreen or makeup application after.
At night it's just the right amount of moisture to keep my skin happy and balanced. I have not had any break outs. There is no noticeable scent, neither on opening, applying or after wearing.
If you are new to solid face creams, serums, etc. give this a little time to find the right balance of how much, how long.
The price for the amount is a great value, and I really like the brands ecologically sound stance. I've been a fan of their haircare and am happy to branch out into the skin and face care. Review Title: Solid face cream in a tube! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Kopari Bubblegum Lip Gloss Kit | Strawberry, Grape, and Bubble Gum Flavors | Hydrating Blend of Shea Butter and Coconut Oil to Nourish and Soothe Chapped Lips | Vegan and Cruelty-Free Review Date: 2022/04/29 Store: Kopari Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Kopari', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Sheer', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Smoothening,Soothing,Shine,Nourishing', 'Package Dimensions': '4.69 x 3.19 x 1.34 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '850036833345'} Review Text: First, I did find these to be thinner than my original coconut glossy. They still add shine and a ton of sweet flavor, but go on a little heavy out of the tube.
The texture after it settles is nice, shiny and not drying. The scents are fantastic, true to the super sweet scents of my much younger years.
It's a fun way to mix up my lip balms! Review Title: Fun flavors! Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details: 1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: 30 PCS Blue Hair Care Rollers Hair Curlers Silicone No Clip Hair Style Rollers Soft Magic DIY Curling Hairstyle Tools Hair Accessories Review Date: 2018/01/08 Store: ONEONEY Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Clip', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Brand': 'ONEONEY', 'Unit Count': '30.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 5.31 x 2.68 inches; 8.57 Ounces'} Review Text: These are an inexpensive and fairly comfortable way to roll my hair at night. It makes getting up and being ready to go in the morning much faster, since all I have to do is unroll, give a spray and shake - and bam waves for days.
However, the quality is decent but not great, one of the rollers looked like it was left out side and got chewed on. But, 1 out of 30 (I counted them) is still good odds for the price.
They came in the matching clear blue zipper bag, and are easy to store. I'd happily purchase another set. Review Title: Comfy curls Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: AG Care Natural Remedy Apple Cider Vinegar Leave On Mist Review Date: 2019/01/06 Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AG Care', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based, Vegan', 'Hair Type': 'All, Color Treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Gently cleanses and seals cuticle to enhance shine. Superfoods and apple cider vinegar support soft, healthy hair.Gently cleanses and seals cuticle to enhance shine. Superfoods and apple cider vinegar support soft, healthy hair. See more', 'Product Dimensions': '1.75 x 1.75 x 6 inches; 6.14 Ounces', 'Item model number': '100150', 'UPC': '625336002391', 'Manufacturer': 'AG Hair', 'Country of Origin': 'Canada'} Review Text: This leave in hair remedy from AG smells wonderful, like a sweet and spicy scent. While it applies strong, it dissipated and left behind a soft clean spicy smell.
It worked really well, and was best when I used it after a work out on damp hair vs dry or showered.
It’s a nice product in my easy care hair Arsenal, I will be picking it up again for my gym bag for sure! Review Title: Soft hair, smells great! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Sunset Dusk Palette | 15 Color Eye Shadow of BEAUTY GLAZED Eyeshadow Palette | QyeeCosmetics. - Amazon Vine Review Date: 2019/01/06 Store: Qyee Cosmetics Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 4.1 x 0.6 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '725714076539'} Review Text: This is actually a decent palette of eyeshadows. They are not super pigmented, but very easy to work with. This is a very nice beginner palette, especially for the under 10 price.
That said, these need a primer. They last an okay amount of time, but will fade quickly if you don’t use a primer.
Simple cardboard container, very similar to colourpop and bh, but doesn’t have a mirror. Still it’s sturdy and all the pans arrived unbroken!
The shades are arranged nicely, it really has a visual appeal, and makes choosing an eye look easier.
It’s realky not bad, and while my tastes typically run towards the more luxury and pigmented, this is a good entry for a beginner or lighter makeup user.
I will be looking into other palettes by this brand. Review Title: High 3 stars Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: TOUCH IN SOL Flawless Skin Top Coat 1.18 fl.oz. (35ml) - One Step Makeup (Nourishing Ampoule + High Adhesive Makeup Base + Fresh Silky Powder), Moisturizing High Coverage Foundation (#1 Light) Review Date: 2019/04/08 Store: Touch in Sol Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Touch in Sol', 'Coverage': 'Light', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing,Flawless Skin', 'Package Dimensions': '4 x 2.3 x 2.3 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} Review Text: My friend recommended this Touch in Sol Flawless skin top coat, and I am so glad she did.
It is really more of a foundation, it has perfect medium coverage. It feels amazing on my skin, light and silky smooth. It leaves me looking matte, but not dry. It's surprisingly radiant.
I use it over the Touch in Sol primer, without setting powder, and it easily lasts the whole day.
So, here I am recommending it to you! Try it! It's amazing! Review Title: Flawless Foundation Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 100 pcs Compressed Facial Mask Women DIY Beauty Facial Cotton Paper Compress Masque Disposable Dry Sheet Mask for Skin Face Care Review Date: 2019/04/22 Store: Evoio Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Evoio', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Cotton Paper', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Unit Count': '100.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.29 x 4.41 x 2.87 inches; 5.96 Ounces'} Review Text: I wasn't sure what to expect from these compressed facial masks in terms of quality, as reviews were across the board. But, they far exceeded my needs and expectations!
They are about the size of three dimes stacked, and are embossed with little flowers on top, which is really just a pretty presentation.
They expand easily with moisture, I mixed up my own serum solution with essential oil, and it was easy to soak and unfold. I worried I would have to be super delicate so as not to tear the paper, but these are more of a fabric than tissue.
In fact, I opened one up to test it's durability. I used some warm water, added some dish soap and went to town scrubbing my basin. No tears, no ripping, no holes. (In fact it cleaned up really well). I used some extra pulling pressure on the cut parts, mouth, eyes chin, and as expected had tears and stretching happen, but that was with abnormal applied pressure.
They didn't smell, they didn't feel weird, and they fit great. For the relaxing usage of a home facial these little compact masks are perfect. I know exactly what I'm putting on my face. Review Title: Super little facial masks! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Women Facial Razor for Hair Removal - Dermaplaning Tool Peach Fuzz Trimmer Womens Fine Hair Remover Eyebrow Razors and Dermaplane Face Shavers Women's Exfoliating for Sensitive Skin Essential Travel Review Date: 2019/06/19 Store: MODEMODE Product Description: ["MODEMODE Women's Facial Razor Home Dermaplaning - Eyebrow Razor For Women Face Peach Fuzz Hair Removal Womens Face Exfoliating At Daily Eyebrow Shaping Tool"] Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MODEMODE', 'Number of Blades': '1', 'Unit Count': '5.0 Count', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 1.2 x 0.5 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MODEMODE'} Review Text: These are some pretty fantastic razors. They are straight edged, but the provided safety edging prevents me from nicking myself while keeping the blade close to my skin.
It removes peach fuzz quickly, efficiently. My skin is super smooth for about a week after use. My makeup goes on like butter, and I am convinced my moisturizers and serums also work better on my dermaplaned skin.
They are small and precision enough that I can use them around my eyebrows, though I go slow and don't usually use them for that.
But for my upper lip, chin, cheeks and forehead I don't know how I got by before these. While my easy to use electric is nice, these are so much closer. Will be a faithful weekly user! Review Title: Dermaplaning-tastic Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mountain Falls Advanced Formula Nail Polish Remover Pads with 96% Acetone, for Natural Nails, 10 Count Review Date: 2019/09/06 Store: Mountain Falls Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Form': 'Pad', 'Item Weight': '0.01 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '10 Count'} Review Text: I wasn't expecting to love these nearly as much as I do. Thick, large and easily removes all ten nails worth of polish without making my fingers feel overly dried out like using my regular polish remover.
Because they are all individually sealed I can keep one in my bag for any polish removing emergencies, which trust me... they happen.
These work fast, I don't know what makes the formula 'advanced' but the process is quick and clean.
The smell isn't overwhelming, just the basic remover smell. Works great, travels even better. I'll be keeping these on hand! Review Title: Super Convienent! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Natwag Makeup Remover Pads,18 Pack 3.74 Inch Reusable Microfiber Cleansing Pad with Laundry Bag Suitable for All Skin Types,3 Color Facial Cleansing Pad Set. Review Date: 2020/07/20 Store: Natwag Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Natwag', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '18.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '18', 'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 4.37 x 2.59 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '745103569701'} Review Text: I adore these makeup remover rounds. They are the perfect size for a clean face, or even just to remove my eye makeup. No getting water everywhere, no harsh chemicals or cleansers, and there is plenty in this set so that I can just use and wash a new one each time.
They are very soft, but don't let that mislead you. Add some water, and wipe away the day. Flip it to the longer side and buff and exfoliate. Super soft, super clean skin - zero irritations.
Highly recommend and will never be using disposable face wipes again! Review Title: Cleansing Pads Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: QTMY Crystal Gemstone Headbands Baroque Hair Accessories Head Band Fashion Headwear Hairbands for Women,Pink Review Date: 2021/01/29 Store: QTMY Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 5.63 x 1.02 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ZJ', 'Department': 'womens', 'Manufacturer': 'QTMY'} Review Text: This is a very comfortable headband, it does not have any under grip however and does slip a little. But, it's worth the minor adjustments when wearing.
Very sparkly, this gives off everyday princess vibes. Plenty of color to match just about anything, and arrived without any missing crystals or pokey spots,
Well made and pretty!! Review Title: Fancy Flair Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Sesame Street, Bubble Bath, Extra Sensitive, 16 Oz, Pack of 6 Review Date: 2021/01/29 Store: Sesame Street Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Sesame Street', 'Scent': 'sesame', 'Product Benefits': 'Nourished,Moisturizing', 'Unit Count': '96 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.84 x 7.68 x 5.28 inches; 1 Pounds', 'Item model number': '28051', 'UPC': '735303280513', 'Manufacturer': 'The Village Company'} Review Text: This is a great bubble bath, soft silky bubbles, long lasting and the scent is really pretty. Not overly strong, and super gentle on my toddlers skin.
Happy bath times = happy me! Review Title: Sesame Street Bubble Bath Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Aldqtz 3PCS Large Star Matte Hair Claw Clips ,Big Nonslip Cute Strong Hold Jaw Clip for Thin Hair Long Hair Thick Hair ,Perfect Star Hair Claw Clips for Women Girls Review Date: 2021/07/15 Store: Aldqtz Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Aldqtz', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Straight', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Claw', 'Embellishment': 'Resin', 'Package Dimensions': '9.57 x 4.37 x 1.85 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '725683934441'} Review Text: This adorable star clip set my hair game bar so high that after wearing it I have no where to go but down.
It held my hair up comfortably all day, and I have a thick amount of hair. It also held up my daughters without any issue.
It's distinctive shape is so much cuter than the typical claw clip.
Highly recommend!!! Review Title: Stars Aligned Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Fiber Lash Mascara 2pcs Waterproof Dense Extra High Lash Blast Voluminous Lengthening Mascara Black, 0.54 Fl Oz Review Date: 2021/07/21 Store: Marine Forest Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Lengthening', 'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Item Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 1.77 x 0.91 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'E3050-2', 'UPC': '762403106955'} Review Text: This mascaras is worth the price, a set of two for under 10? Go for it. It's not overly sticky, though the consistency is weird and rubbery coming out of the tube.
It goes on dark, dries quickly and doesn't smudge. Does it really lengthen? Eh. Not really for me. But, it's not messy or flaky.
I don't know if I will repurchase, but the price point is good. Review Title: Cheap and dark Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Ethique Quench Lightweight Solid Face Moisturizer Tube for Oily to Balanced Skin - Plastic-Free, Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Eco-Friendly, 2.29 oz (Pack of 1) Review Date: 2022/02/17 Store: Ethique Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ethique', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Unit Count': '2.29 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '3.54 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches; 2.47 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Quench Bar Solid Face Moisturiser', 'UPC': '810003557681'} Review Text: First, the solid cream is solid. At first application I tried just putting it on my face directly from the tube and stopped almost immediately because I did not want to tug at my skin. Instead, I did the bar method of application by using my fingers on the top to warm it and then tapped it onto my skin. The next morning I let it sit on my cheek an extra moment and was apply to seamlessly apply with little to no tugging.
It's a a balm texture from the tube, but then melts into an almost oil/cream. While I find it takes a little for the oils to fully settle onto the skin once they do, I don't find it to be greasy or heavy.
I put this under my SPF in the morning like a serum, and it doesn't pill or bunch up or affect my sunscreen or makeup application after.
At night it's just the right amount of moisture to keep my skin happy and balanced. I have not had any break outs. There is no noticeable scent, neither on opening, applying or after wearing.
If you are new to solid face creams, serums, etc. give this a little time to find the right balance of how much, how long.
The price for the amount is a great value, and I really like the brands ecologically sound stance. I've been a fan of their haircare and am happy to branch out into the skin and face care. Review Title: Solid face cream in a tube! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Kopari Bubblegum Lip Gloss Kit | Strawberry, Grape, and Bubble Gum Flavors | Hydrating Blend of Shea Butter and Coconut Oil to Nourish and Soothe Chapped Lips | Vegan and Cruelty-Free Review Date: 2022/04/29 Store: Kopari Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Kopari', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Sheer', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Smoothening,Soothing,Shine,Nourishing', 'Package Dimensions': '4.69 x 3.19 x 1.34 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '850036833345'} Review Text: First, I did find these to be thinner than my original coconut glossy. They still add shine and a ton of sweet flavor, but go on a little heavy out of the tube.
The texture after it settles is nice, shiny and not drying. The scents are fantastic, true to the super sweet scents of my much younger years.
It's a fun way to mix up my lip balms! Review Title: Fun flavors! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- Format your response exactly as follows: POSITIVE SUMMARY: [Your positive summary here] NEGATIVE SUMMARY: [Your negative summary here] OVERALL SUMMARY: [Your overall summary here]
raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has experienced several positive interactions with their purchases, particularly appreciating the comfort and effectiveness of hair care tools. They found the hair curlers affordable and functional for overnight curling, which saves time in the morning. The leave-in hair mist was praised for its pleasant scent and ability to enhance hair softness, making it a staple for post-workout routines. Additionally, the user enjoyed high-quality facial masks that exceeded expectations in durability and ease of use. Makeup items, such as the eyeshadow palette and foundation, received commendation for their value and effectiveness, particularly as beginner products. Overall, the user expressed satisfaction with their shopping experiences, indicating a willingness to repurchase most items.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Despite numerous positive experiences, some purchases did not meet expectations. The user noted that certain products, like the eyeshadow palette and mascara, lacked the desired pigmentation and staying power, requiring additional products for optimal performance. The hair clips had mixed reviews, with concerns about comfort due to slipping. The user also pointed out a few quality issues, like a damaged roller among the hair curlers. Additionally, the facial moisturizer's solid form was initially challenging to apply, highlighting a learning curve with that particular product. These negative experiences suggest that while the user enjoys many products, there are areas for improvement in quality and usability.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
Overall, the user’s shopping history reveals a mix of positive and negative experiences with beauty and hair care products. Many items, such as hair tools, facial masks, and moisturizers, received high praise for their effectiveness and quality, often exceeding expectations. However, there were notable disappointments regarding the performance and quality of certain makeup products, along with issues like product application and fit. Despite some dissatisfaction, the user's overall sentiment remains positive, as they readily recommend their favorite products and consistently express a desire to repurchase items that worked well for them.

target_interaction.title: When life gives you lemons!
target_interaction.text: These are the best quick little clean up your face pads. Super gentle, they aren't drying or irritating. They smell great, and my kids actually want to use them. Fast and deep cleansing these are ideal for the whole family. Plus, the pads are small and not overly saturated so you don't get messy using them.
target_interaction.title_meta: Clean & Clear Exfoliating Lemon Slices Brightening and Cleansing Face Pads with Lemon Extract Vitamin to Cleanse PoreClogging Dirt Oil Free Pads, 45 Count
features: 45-count of Clean & Clear Lemon Exfoliating Facial Pad Slices with lemon extract and Vitamin C to gently exfoliate and cleanse skin for bright, clear, happy skin
These daily face exfoliator pads are designed to be oil-free and gently swipe away pore-clogging dirt and oil, leaving skin feeling happy and clean
These pre-moistened, textured face pads are specially formulated with lemon extract and Vitamin C
These oil-free face scrubbing pads can be used on a daily basis to exfoliate skin and wash away debris and surface oil with no need to rinse

Exfoliator pads make a great addition to a regular skincare routine or regimen. Look for other products in the Clean & Clear Lemon line, including the Zesty Scrub, Cleansing Wipes, Juice Toner and Gel Cleanser
description: Get bright, clear, happy skin with Clean & Clear Lemon Exfoliating Slices. These daily facial cleansing pads gently cleanse and exfoliate to remove pore-clogging dirt and oil, leaving skin feeling clean and happy. The pre-moistened exfoliating face pads are enriched with lemon extract and vitamin C and help to reduce shine and oil. Convenient and disposable, these oil-free face scrubbing pads can be used every day to exfoliate skin and wipe away debris - with no need to rinse. Look for other products in the Clean & Clear Lemon line, including the Zesty Scrub, Cleansing Wipes, Juice Toner and Gel Cleanser.
